Analyze renovation blueprints to identify scope, risks, and opportunities. This includes a detailed review of existing conditions, zoning compliance, and potential for value engineering.
Compare subcontractor bids based on scope, cost, and qualifications. This involves a detailed analysis of proposals to identify the best value for the project.
Compare vendor quotes for materials and equipment. This includes a detailed analysis of pricing, lead times, and product specifications to ensure the best value and timely delivery.
